Package.Description: Wizard, which help user to connect to Jabber network
Package.Name: ru.rwsoftware.eyecu.wizards.account
Package.UpdateText: Sometimes connection with server didn't even start. Connection Wizard didn't allow to create a new account, if accont with the same bare JID (and different resource) exists already. Enabled sorting in server list. Removed support of tf-network.de, which do not work anymore.
